snippet: The government’s new online scorecard can help families cut through some of the cost confusion.
abstract: Editorial applauds federal government's new online college scorecard, which can help students and families cut through some of the cost confusion; says tool, which shows average net costs and compares tuition among schools, could be improved by including different debt data.
lead_paragraph: The government’s new online scorecard can help families cut through some of the cost confusion.
